item.description:
The Boston Poetry Collective has posted the full schedule for its 2012 Dog Day Poetry Marathoon. This series of readings and 15-minute talks on literary topics, spread over Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, August 17th-19th, will take place at Outpost 186 in Inman Square, Cambridge.

An unofficial flyer suitable for printing and distribution can be downloaded at http://files.meetup.com/122206/dog-days-poetry-marathoon-2012.pdf.
For more information about the event, visit http://bostonpoetry.blogspot.com or email bostonpoetry@gmail.com.

FRIDAY
7:00 - 10:00pm

7:00 John Mulrooney
7:08 Emily Spiegelman
7:16 Kythe Heller
7:24 Chuck Stebelton
7:32 Brenda Iijima
7:40 January O'Neil
7:48 Jordan Davis
break

8:22 Ruth Lepson: Talk on Alberto de Lacerda
8:37 Guillermo Parra: Talk on Jose Antonio Ramos Sucre
break

9:10 Ish Klein
9:18 Michael Carr
9:26 Rachel Sachs Steele
9:34 Janaka Stucky
9:42 Bridget Madden
9:50 Gilmore Tamny
item.name: Day 1 of 3: 2012 Dog Days Poetry Marathoon
